targets.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(packets_recv), 1s)*count(packets_recv)/count(packets_recv) as "in" FROM "net" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hostname$/ AND "interface" =~ /^$interface$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(packets_sent), 1s)*count(packets_sent)/count(packets_sent) as "in" FROM "net" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hostname$/ AND "interface" =~ /^$interface$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

list.definition: show tag values from "system" with key="host"
list.label: Host-Name
list.name: hostname
list.query: show tag values from "system" with key="host"

list.definition: show tag values from "net" with key="interface"
list.label: Interface
list.name: interface
list.query: show tag values from "net" with key="interface"
